title: Mechanism of puerarin alleviating myocardial remodeling through NSUN2-mediated m5C methylation modification.
abstract: Myocardial remodeling is a primary contributor to the development and progression of heart failure. Reversing this process is crucial for the prevention and treatment of heart failure. Puerarin (Pue), a traditional Chinese medicine, has been widely utilized in the management of cardiovascular diseases; however, its potential mechanisms for reversing myocardial remodeling remain unclear.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
